title: Reconnecting issues
body: So I'm trying to enjoy the game, and I keep getting stuck with the  reconnecting tab at such low ms. 68 on average. Tried resetting my adapter, my modem, nothing fixes it.

replies.body: Something may be blocking your connection from reaching the game servers.  No worries, we have a [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide that can help get you back in game.  Try it out in custom games to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions!
